Company: Alta Bates Summit Medical Center, AverMedia Technologies
Description of incident: Two women are accused of misusing the information of over 115 people in the Bay Area for identity theft purposes.  At least 15 Atla Bates Summit Medical Center patients had their information misused and at least 35 had their information collected.  The two women were arrested on November 5 and also had a payroll sheet from AverMedia Technologies in their possession.
